newsitem.title: UK: Pearson firm on satellite flotation report.
newsitem.headline: Pearson firm on satellite flotation report.

text.p: Shares in Pearson Plc firmed on Wednesday after a report in the Independent newspaper said it could reap a cash windfall from the flotation of Luxembourg-based Societe Europeenne des Satellites, in which it has a six percent stake, traders said.
Shares in the media and leisure group were up 1-1/2p at 776-1/2 by 0858 GMT, after earlier reaching a near-record 780p.

The newspaper said there was speculation that the flotation of the Luxembourg group was back on track and could value Pearson's stake at up to 180 million stg -- pushing sum-of-parts valuations on Pearson up towards 1000p.
No-one at Pearson was immediately available for comment.
